Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mob

Class MobStoreEngine

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.StoreEngine<DefaultStoreFlusher,RatioBasedCompactionPolicy,DefaultCompactor,DefaultStoreFileManager>
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.DefaultStoreEngine
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mob.MobStoreEngine
@Private public class MobStoreEngine extends DefaultStoreEngine
MobStoreEngine creates the mob specific compactor, and store flusher.
